name: Break the Destiny
text: Target 1 "Destiny End Dragoon", or 1 Level 8 or higher "Destiny HERO" monster, in your Monster Zone; destroy it, and if you do, skip your opponent's next Main Phase 1. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 Spell/Trap that specifically lists "Destiny End Dragoon" or a "Destiny HERO" monster's name in its text from your Deck to your hand, except "Break the Destiny". You can only use 1 "Break the Destiny" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
